name: MisHit
description:
DISCLAIMER: The game will start in the "game view".  Just play it normally until you win or lose.  For the win/lose screen, the top button goes to the main menu and the bottom plays again. Also, play in full screen and at 50% view for the best experience.

Have fun :)

Controls: W: Up, A: Left, S: Down, D: Right, Left-Click: Shoot

Made for the SeacSTA 2020 Game Making Competition

Theme: Contamination 

Art and Programming made by Sastha BK.

 Music from the Megaman series. 

Art created using Adobe Photoshop. 

Programming made using Unity and Visual Studio Code.
